advenTitle3: A company that has been producing cotton fabrics for global use for many years
footerDesc: “Bukhara Natural Product” has been producing cotton fabrics for global use for many years.
descText: A sheet is a household item and bedroom decor designed for comfort and beauty. You can choose from various bedding sets, including sheets, blankets, pillowcases, and other accessories. They come in various designs, prints, embroidery, or other design elements. They are easy to clean and maintain. Made from soft materials, they make your bedroom cozy and comfortable.
aboutDesc: Bukhara Fabrics, Eco Bags. Our factory has been producing cotton fabrics for global use for many years.
aboutDesc2: The company has been serving customers for 17 years.
aboutDesc3: The company's main goal is to produce high-quality and cost-effective products.
aboutDesc4: The company's manufacturing process is entirely eco-friendly.
aboutDesc5: The company can produce any type of cotton raw material based on customer requests and suggestions.
aboutDesc6: The company is the official distributor of DongJia weaving machines in Uzbekistan.
aboutDesc7: Currently, more than 80 families are financially supported by the company, contributing to its reputation and success.
aboutDesc8: To meet demand, 50 weaving looms operate continuously at high speed.
aboutDesc9: We have the capacity to weave 200-250 thousand meters of fabric per month.
aboutDesc10: Due to high customer demand, high-quality eco-bags production has been established.
aboutDesc11: The company “Bukhara Natural Product” is pleased to serve its loyal customers at any time.
